sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 内战结束后，美国南北方的人民都面临着艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: I am er, Jimmy Florcruz with CNN. Premier Wen, er, you have the biggest and toughest jobs in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，您的任务是世界上最艰巨，也是最庞杂的。

sentences.english: Getting over a hundred people to sign up for anything these days is a tough enough task.
sentences.chinese: 百余人签约的事情，这几天是艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: The complexity of hukou reform daunts Chinese leaders.
sentences.chinese: 户籍改革的艰巨和复杂性让政府踌躇不前。

sentences.english: Therefore, the ideological work of college teachers is an arduous task with great significance.
sentences.chinese: 高校教师思想政治工作任务艰巨，意义重大。

sentences.english: The most difficult and onerous tasks to build a well-off society comprehensively focus on rural area.
sentences.chinese: 全面建设小康社会，最艰巨最繁重的任务在农村。

sentences.english: With youth and blood, courage and wisdom to complete the arduous task.
sentences.chinese: 用青春和热血，胆魄与智慧完成了艰巨任务。

sentences.english: Malaysian anti-terrorism situation is gloomy and doomy and anti-terrorism is an arduous task.
sentences.chinese: 马来西亚的恐怖主义形势不容乐观，反恐任务艰巨。

sentences.english: To sum up, it is a hard job to study the essence of things.
sentences.chinese: 总之，对于事物本质的研究是一项艰巨的工作。

sentences.english: As you know, immigrating way is extremely difficult and arduous.
sentences.chinese: 正如你们所知，移民之路相当困难而又艰巨。

sentences.english: He has just come off a difficult assignment.
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚结束了一项艰巨任务。

sentences.english: This is a glorious but difficult task.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个光荣而艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: It's a tough assignment, and it will either make or break her.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个艰巨的任务，胜败在此一举。

sentences.english: The love and care you have given us will encourage us to go through a long and arduous journey.
sentences.chinese: 您给以我们的爱和眷注将激昂着我们走过艰巨困苦。

sentences.english: You did it because you understand the enormity of the task that lies on.
sentences.chinese: 你这样做，是因为你真切任务的艰巨性是摆在面前。

sentences.english: But packaging simple and complex in one can be a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 融简单与复杂为一炉，这可是个艰巨的挑战。

definition: a heavy load and a long road/fig. to bear heavy responsibilities through a long struggle (cf Confucian Analects, 8.7)
to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
pressing in on one's eyelashes (idiom); imminent
